EmailTemplate.name: End of WEEK Push for LLC/SP *Onboarding fee waived*
EmailTemplate.subject: Save $700 on Membership- Offer ends this Friday!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.First_Name__c},
I want to make sure you don't miss out on this new and exclusive offer! If you join this Friday by midnight, you'll get 50% off the first 2 months ($299), and we'll also waive the onboarding fee ($399), a total of $700 savings!
Use code LASTCHANCE at checkout with this link: {!Opportunity.Signup_Link__c}. Let me know if you have any questions.
Join us as a member today!
Best, {!User.Name}
